original_text: Then shall ye return, and discern between the righteous and the wicked, between him that serveth God and him that serveth him not.
korean_text: 그 때에 너희가 돌아와서 의인과 악인을 분별하고 하나님을 섬기는 자와 섬기지 아니하는 자를 분별하리라

sentences.original_text: and discern between the righteous and the wicked
and him that serveth him not
